title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner Of Azkaban_extended edition_x264ma
description:
Film name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban


Film studio name: Warner


Date Original Film Was Released: 31 MAY 2004


Original Runtime: 141 min


New Runtime: 144 min


Amount of time Cut/Added: 3 min added



Cuts removed/added/extended:




Restored Scenes:


* Extended bird sequence (Great John Williams-scored flute solo in its entirety)


* Return from Hogsmeade village in the Great Hall - Exploding candy


* Upon returning to the Gryffindor commons, McGonagall tells the students to be wary; Harry broods on Sirius (This was edited down from the full scene, which was an abandoned sublot of Sirius invading Harry&#039;s room while they slept, having found Neville&#039;s list of passwords.)


* Sir Cadogan takes the position of the Fat Lady


Use mplayer or mplayer frontends like smplayer for smooth playback.
